net.smacke.jaydio

Class DirectRandomAccessFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.smacke.jaydio.DirectRandomAccessFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, DataInput, DataOutput, AutoCloseable

    public class DirectRandomAccessFile
extends Object
implements DataInput, DataOutput, Closeable
    Class to emulate the behavior of RandomAccessFile, but using direct I/O.
    Author:
    smacke

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectRandomAccessFile

        public DirectRandomAccessFile(String name,
                      String mode)
                       throws IOException
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to open
        mode - Either "rw" or "r", depending on whether this file is read only
        Throws:
        IOException

      • DirectRandomAccessFile

        public DirectRandomAccessFile(File file,
                      String mode)
                       throws IOException
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open
        mode - Either "rw" or "r", depending on whether this file is read only
        Throws:
        IOException

      • DirectRandomAccessFile

        public DirectRandomAccessFile(File file,
                      String mode,
                      int bufferSize)
                       throws IOException
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open
        mode - Either "rw" or "r", depending on whether this file is read only
        bufferSize - The size of the buffer used to manually buffer I/O If -1 the default buffer size is used, which depends on how DirectIoLib is implemented.
        Throws:
        IOException
